text: Paul Brand (born 16 September 1985 in Bridgend, Wales) is a Welsh-English reporter and a television broadcaster. ==Works== He is currently the senior editor of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland for ITV. He has been the host of the current affairs show Tonight since 2022. He was previously a political reporter for ITV. It helped cover a series of meetings allegedly held at government buildings during the COVID-19 pandemic. Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:British people
title: Paul Brand (journalist)
